help-file.title: "ELEMENTAL FORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
"Elemental Form" infuses the druid with the power of one of the elemental planes. The druid increases in bodily size and physical power, and gains some of the abilities inherent to the denizens of the plane from which he is drawing power.
